title: Textile, 1801–1825
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Repeat H: 35 cm (13 3/4 in.)
Warp x Weft: 36.5 x 83 cm (14 3/8 x 32 11/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Dr. Francis J. Geck
description: Slightly more than one repeat of two country scenes: dancing on the banks of a mill pond and a casstle next to a lake with fishermen, swimmers and boaters. Color: purple.
